sentence.Network_en: Skin biopsy from the macule revealed malignant T - cell lymphoma with skin involvement and concurrent cytomegalovirus infection.
sentence.Network_cn: 紫斑处之病理切片显示恶性 T 细胞淋巴瘤侵犯皮肤并合并皮肤之巨细胞病毒感染.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from French, or from Latin macula 'spot'

means.word_mean: 1. a patch of skin that is discolored but not usually elevated; caused by various diseases
